00010 bool EditorManager::DeleteEntityEvent(tbe::EventManager* event)
00011 {
00012     if(!m_selectedNode)
00013         return false;
00014 
00015     if(event->notify != EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00016         return false;
00017 
00018     if(event->lastActiveKey.first == EventManager::KEY_DELETE)
00019     {
00020         if(tools::find(map.staticObjects, m_selectedNode))
00021             UnRegisterStatic(dynamic_cast<StaticObject*>(m_selectedNode));
00022 
00023         if(tools::find(map.dynamicObjects, m_selectedNode))
00024             UnRegisterDynamic(dynamic_cast<DynamicObject*>(m_selectedNode));
00025 
00026         if(tools::find(map.items, m_selectedNode))
00027             UnRegisterItem(dynamic_cast<Item*>(m_selectedNode));
00028 
00029         if(tools::find(m_visualSpawnPoints, m_selectedNode))
00030             tools::erase(m_visualSpawnPoints, m_selectedNode);
00031 
00032         tools::erase(m_allEntity, m_selectedNode);
00033 
00034         delete m_selectedNode, m_selectedNode = NULL;
00035 
00036         return true;
00037     }
00038 
00039     return false;
00040 }

00042 void EditorManager::NewEntity(Object* ent)
00043 {
00044     m_allEntity.push_back(ent);
00045 
00046     manager.scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(ent);
00047 
00048     Vector3f pos = ent->GetPos();
00049     m_axes->SetPos(pos);
00050     m_OCamera->SetCenter(pos);
00051 }

00053 bool EditorManager::AllocEntityEvent(EventManager* event)
00054 {
00055     Object* newObj = NULL;
00056 
00057     int c = event->lastActiveKey.first;
00058 
00059     if(c == 'c' && event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN && m_selectedNode)
00060     {
00061         Object* clone = NULL;
00062         if(tools::find(m_visualSpawnPoints, m_selectedNode))
00063         {
00064             clone = new StaticObject(this, OBJ_SPAWN, m_axes->GetPos());
00065 
00066             m_visualSpawnPoints.push_back(clone);
00067         }
00068 
00069         else
00070         {
00071             clone = m_selectedNode->CloneToObject();
00072         }
00073 
00074         NewEntity(clone);
00075         m_selectedNode = clone;
00076 
00077         return true;
00078     }
00079 
00080     // Dynamics
00081     if(event->keyState['d'] && event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00082     {
00083         DynamicObject* dy = NULL;
00084 
00085         switch(c)
00086         {
00087             case 'j':
00088                 dy = new DYJumper(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00089                 break;
00090             case 't':
00091                 dy = new DYTeleporter(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00092                 break;
00093         }
00094 
00095         if(dy)
00096         {
00097             RegisterDynamic(dy);
00098             newObj = dy;
00099         }
00100     }
00101 
00102         // Item
00103     else if(event->keyState['t'] && event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00104     {
00105         Item* it = NULL;
00106 
00107         switch(c)
00108         {
00109             case 'l':
00110                 it = new ItemAddLife(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00111                 break;
00112             case 'a':
00113                 it = new ItemAddAmmo(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00114                 break;
00115             case 's':
00116                 it = new ItemSuperLife(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00117                 break;
00118             case 'f':
00119                 it = new ItemFatalShot(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00120                 break;
00121             case 'i':
00122                 it = new ItemAddFinder(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00123                 break;
00124             case 'h':
00125                 it = new ItemAddShotgun(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00126                 break;
00127             case 'b':
00128                 it = new ItemAddBomb(this, m_axes->GetPos());
00129                 break;
00130         }
00131 
00132         if(it)
00133         {
00134             RegisterItem(it);
00135             newObj = it;
00136         }
00137     }
00138 
00139     else if(event->keyState['p'] && event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00140     {
00141         StaticObject* visualSpawn = new StaticObject(this, OBJ_SPAWN, m_axes->GetPos());
00142 
00143         m_visualSpawnPoints.push_back(visualSpawn);
00144 
00145         newObj = visualSpawn;
00146     }
00147 
00148         // Static
00149     else
00150     {
00151         if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00152         {
00153             if(event->lastActiveKey.first == 's')
00154                 hud.entity.list->SetEnable(true);
00155 
00156             else if(event->lastActiveKey.first == EventManager::KEY_ESCAPE)
00157                 hud.entity.list->CancelSelection();
00158         }
00159 
00160         else if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_UP)
00161         {
00162             if(event->lastActiveKey.first == 's')
00163             {
00164                 if(hud.entity.list->IsSelection())
00165                 {
00166                     string filename = hud.entity.list->GetCurrentData().GetValue<string > ();
00167 
00168                     StaticObject* so = new StaticObject(this, filename, m_axes->GetPos());
00169                     RegisterStatic(so);
00170                     newObj = so;
00171 
00172                     parallelscene.newton->SetWorldSize(map.aabb);
00173 
00174                     hud.entity.list->CancelSelection();
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 hud.entity.list->SetEnable(false);
00178             }
00179         }
00180     }
00181 
00182     if(newObj)
00183     {
00184         NewEntity(newObj);
00185         m_selectedNode = newObj;
00186 
00187         return true;
00188     }
00189 
00190     return false;
00191 }

00193 struct SelectionSort
00194 {
00195     tbe::Vector3f cameraPos;
00196     bool byPos;
00197 
00198     bool operator()(const tbe::scene::Node* node1, const tbe::scene::Node * node2)
00199     {
00200         if(byPos)
00201             return (node1->GetPos() - cameraPos) < (node2->GetPos() - cameraPos);
00202         else
00203             return node1->GetAabb().GetSize() < node2->GetAabb().GetSize();
00204     }
00205 };

00207 bool EditorManager::SelectEntityEvent(tbe::EventManager * event)
00208 {
00209     if(event->notify != EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_DOWN)
00210         return false;
00211 
00212     if(event->mouseState[EventManager::MOUSE_BUTTON_RIGHT])
00213     {
00214         m_selectedNode = NULL;
00215 
00216         SelectionSort pred;
00217 
00218         pred.cameraPos = m_camera->GetPos();
00219         pred.byPos = true;
00220         std::sort(m_allEntity.begin(), m_allEntity.end(), pred);
00221 
00222         pred.byPos = false;
00223         std::sort(m_allEntity.begin(), m_allEntity.end(), pred);
00224 
00225         for(unsigned i = 0; i < m_allEntity.size(); i++)
00226         {
00227             if(m_allEntity[i]->GetAbsolutAabb().Add(AABB(0.5f)).IsInner(m_3dSelect))
00228             {
00229                 m_selectedNode = m_allEntity[i];
00230                 break;
00231             }
00232         }
00233 
00234         if(m_selectedNode)
00235         {
00236             m_axes->SetPos(m_selectedNode->GetPos());
00237             m_OCamera->SetCenter(m_selectedNode->GetPos());
00238 
00239             return true;
00240         }
00241     }
00242 
00243     return false;
00244 }

00246 bool EditorManager::SettingEntityEvent(EventManager* event)
00247 {
00248     if(!m_selectedNode)
00249         return false;
00250 
00251     Vector3f grid(1);
00252 
00253     float moveSpeed = 0.05;
00254     float rotateSpeed = 15 * M_PI / 180;
00255 
00256     if(event->keyState[EventManager::KEY_LSHIFT])
00257     {
00258         manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(false);
00259         manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(true);
00260 
00261         if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_MOVE)
00262         {
00263             Vector3f transform;
00264             Vector3f target = m_camera->GetTarget();
00265             Vector3f left = m_camera->GetLeft();
00266 
00267             if(event->keyState[EventManager::KEY_LALT])
00268             {
00269                 transform.y = event->mousePosRel.y * moveSpeed;
00270             }
00271             else
00272             {
00273                 transform = left * (float)event->mousePosRel.x * moveSpeed;
00274                 transform += target * (float)event->mousePosRel.y * moveSpeed;
00275                 transform.y = 0;
00276             }
00277 
00278             transform += m_selectedNode->GetPos();
00279 
00280             m_selectedNode->GetPhysicBody()->SetPos(transform);
00281             m_axes->SetPos(transform);
00282         }
00283 
00284         else if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_MOUSE_DOWN)
00285         {
00286             Vector3f transform;
00287 
00288             if(event->lastActiveMouse.first == EventManager::MOUSE_BUTTON_WHEEL_UP)
00289                 transform.y++;
00290             else if(event->lastActiveMouse.first == EventManager::MOUSE_BUTTON_WHEEL_DOWN)
00291                 transform.y--;
00292 
00293             transform += m_selectedNode->GetPos();
00294 
00295 
00296             m_selectedNode->SetPos(transform);
00297             m_axes->SetPos(transform);
00298         }
00299 
00300         else if(event->notify == EventManager::EVENT_KEY_DOWN)
00301         {
00302             Vector3f pos = m_selectedNode->GetPos();
00303             Matrix4f matrix = m_selectedNode->GetMatrix();
00304 
00305             // Rotation
00306             if(event->keyState['A'])
00307                 matrix.SetRotateX(-rotateSpeed);
00308             if(event->keyState['Z'])
00309                 matrix.SetRotateX(rotateSpeed);
00310             if(event->keyState['Q'])
00311                 matrix.SetRotateY(-rotateSpeed);
00312             if(event->keyState['S'])
00313                 matrix.SetRotateY(rotateSpeed);
00314             if(event->keyState['W'])
00315                 matrix.SetRotateZ(-rotateSpeed);
00316             if(event->keyState['X'])
00317                 matrix.SetRotateZ(rotateSpeed);
00318 
00319             // In the floor
00320             if(event->keyState['F'])
00321             {
00322                 Vector3f start = pos;
00323                 start.y += m_selectedNode->GetAabb().max.y;
00324 
00325                 Vector3f end = map.aabb.min;
00326                 end.x = pos.x;
00327                 end.z = pos.z;
00328 
00329                 pos = parallelscene.newton->FindZeroMassBody(start, end);
00330 
00331                 if(event->keyState[EventManager::KEY_LALT])
00332                     pos.y += -m_selectedNode->GetAabb().min.y;
00333             }
00334 
00335             // In the gride
00336             if(event->keyState['G'])
00337                 tools::round(pos, grid);
00338 
00339             // Apply
00340             matrix.SetPos(pos);
00341 
00342             m_selectedNode->GetPhysicBody()->SetMatrix(matrix);
00343             m_axes->SetPos(pos);
00344         }
00345 
00346         return true;
00347     }
00348 
00349     else
00350     {
00351         manager.gameEngine->SetMouseVisible(true);
00352         manager.gameEngine->SetGrabInput(false);
00353     }
00354 
00355     return false;
00356 }
